trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle keyboard-related routed events.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理鍵盤相關路由的事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: No existing keyboard event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses the KeyboardEventHandler delegate.
trans-unit.target: 中沒有現有的鍵盤事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]使用 KeyboardEventHandler 委派。

trans-unit.source: KeyboardEventHandler uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs> base class as its event data class.
trans-unit.target: KeyboardEventHandler 會使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs>基底類別，作為其事件資料類別。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs> serves as the base class for the more specific <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs> event data classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs>做為更特定的基底類別<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>事件資料類別。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs></xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: These event data classes are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler> delegates, and those delegates are used by existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 會使用這些事件資料類別<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler>委派，因此這些委派會使用現有的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]事件，例如<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler>
